Snapshot ¶ Focus Highlights Degrees BS Computer Science (AI + HCI), Accelerated MS (Machine Learning) @ Georgia Tech Current Role Cloud Network Engineering Intern @ UKG Entrepreneurship Founder of sustainability-focused Chrome extension (150+ global users) Tech Stack Java, Python, C/C++, C#, TypeScript/React, Django/REST, SQL, PyTorch, NLP Interests Applied ML, Scalable Web Systems, Developer Experience, Assistive Tech Education ¶ Georgia Institute of Technology â€“ BS Computer Science (Artificial Intelligence & Human-Computer Interaction), GPA 3.85 (Aug 2022 â€“ Dec 2026) Georgia Institute of Technology â€“ MS Computer Science (Machine Learning) (Aug 2026 â€“ May 2027) Technical Skills ¶ Languages: Java, Python, C, C++, C#, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, TypeScript, SQL, Git Frameworks / Tools: PyTorch, SpaCy, NumPy, Pandas, Django, Django REST Framework, NLP, OOP, GitHub Cloud / Infra Exposure: VPC Networking, Cloud CDN, Load Balancers, Cloud Functions, Cloud Armor, Compute Engine Product Strengths: Rapid prototyping, API design, UI/UX iteration, AI-assisted workflows Experience ¶ Cloud Network Engineering Intern â€“ UKG (Sep 2025 â€“ Present) ¶ Optimizing SaaS networking across hybrid environments; working with edge delivery, security layers (Cloud Armor), and traffic performance tooling. Founder / Fullâ€‘Stack Developer â€“ Sensible (Aug 2023 â€“ Present) ¶ Built and iterated an awardâ€‘winning sustainability Chrome extension (150+ users). Designed UI in Figma + React + Materialâ€‘UI; engineered custom components when library gaps emerged. Software Engineering Intern â€“ Verizon (Jun 2025 â€“ Aug 2025) ¶ Deployed internal web app centralizing operational tools. Built automated Python/Pandas audit pipeline cutting daily timesheet approval time 60%+. Translated field technician workflows into actionable software improvements. Selected Projects ¶ Rewind â€“ Spotify Wrapped Web App ¶ Fullâ€‘stack Django + React platform generating multi-frame summaries of listening behavior. Integrates Spotify Web API + OpenAI for AIâ€‘curated narrative summaries with persistence and deletion controls. Google Glass Grocery Scanner ¶ Barcode scanning app using ZXing + Open Food Facts API on legacy Google Glass hardware. Resolved deprecated stack constraints; optimized scan + display loop for constrained UX. ASD Social Support Prototype ¶ Assistive application leveraging Python backend + React interface + Hugging Face API to mediate interaction patterns for youth with ASD; integrated Arduino component pipeline. Foodie â€“ Atlanta Restaurant Discovery ¶ Frontâ€‘end development on team of five. Filterable interface (range, rating, cuisine) powered by Google Maps API + Django backend. Lightweight NLP Knowledge Agent ¶ Custom SpaCy-based pipeline parsing prompts to extract semantic relations; answers contextual questions at 85% accuracy (34/40 test set). Leadership & Involvement ¶ GT Mobile App Development â€¢ GT Web Dev â€¢ National Society of Black Engineers (NSBE) â€¢ African American Student Union â€¢ Minorities at College of Computing Resume ¶ You can open the PDF directly here: Download Resume (PDF) If the link breaks when deployed, move & rename the PDF to docs/Brandon-Parker-Resume.pdf then update both links to (Brandon-Parker-Resume.pdf) (no spaces/apostrophe). docs.title: Contact

docs.text: About Me ¶ I'm Brandon Parker — BSCS (AI + HCI) and incoming MSCS (Machine Learning) student at Georgia Tech. I work where cloud infrastructure , full‑stack product engineering , and applied ML meet human-centered design. Focus Areas ¶ Area What I do Cloud & Networking Improve reliability, latency, and secure delivery paths Full‑Stack Systems Build APIs + frontends that emphasize clarity & iteration speed Applied ML / NLP Use models to summarize, prioritize, or augment—not overwhelm Developer Experience Reduce friction via tooling, docs, and observability Assistive & Ethical Tech Leverage software to broaden access and support users Core Principles ¶ Ship iteratively—optimize feedback loops early. Make performance & reliability observable by design. Simplicity scales; abstractions must earn their keep. AI augments workflows when context is preserved. Documentation should explain intent, not just behavior. Recent Milestones ¶ Launched sustainability Chrome extension (150+ users) Built ML/NLP experimentation projects (semantic parsing & summarization) Verizon internship: internal platform + automation reducing manual review time 60%+ UKG internship: hybrid cloud networking exposure (edge, security, routing) Outside the Terminal ¶ I enjoy reverse‑engineering product UX flows, sketching interface concepts, and mentoring peers on readable API design. Back Home

docs.text: Projects ¶ Rewind – Spotify Wrapped Web App ¶ Full‑stack (Django + React) app generating multi-frame historical summaries of user listening behavior. Integrates Spotify Web API + OpenAI for curated narrative insights with persistence & deletion controls. Tech: Django, REST API, React, OpenAI API, SQL Google Glass Grocery Scanner ¶ Barcode scanning on legacy Google Glass hardware using ZXing + Open Food Facts API. Worked around deprecated components; optimized scan & display loop for constrained UX. Tech: Java, ZXing, Open Food Facts API, Embedded UI ASD Social Support Prototype ¶ Assistive application mediating social interaction patterns for youth with ASD using Python backend + React frontend + Hugging Face API + Arduino integration. Tech: Python, React, Hugging Face API, Hardware integration Foodie – Atlanta Restaurant Discovery ¶ Filterable restaurant explorer (range, rating, cuisine) with Google Maps integration; contributed front‑end components and data wiring on a 5-person team. Tech: Django, SQLite, JavaScript, Google Maps API Lightweight NLP Knowledge Agent ¶ SpaCy-based semantic relation + relevance extraction answering contextual questions (85% accuracy on internal 34/40 test set). Tech: Python, SpaCy, NLP pipelines Sensible – Sustainability Chrome Extension ¶ Award-winning Chrome extension guiding sustainable browsing choices; iterative UI design in Figma, >150 users worldwide. Tech: React, Material UI, Chrome Extension APIs, Figma Home
